data.text:
I'm telling you, we need more boom! More bang! And umm… I want 
to do something that goes fast and makes a nyoom sound!
data.name: Twin Turbo

data.text:
Umm… We're still talking about the anniversary live concert, 
right? I can't imagine any of those onomatopoeias having 
anything to do with it.
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
When you said "boom" and "bang…" you probably mean that you 
want something with a huge impact. And when it comes to "fast…"
data.name: Ikuno Dictus

data.text:
I think that a float covered in lights 
would be likely to fit what she's thinking.
data.name: Ikuno Dictus

data.text:
Ahh… Umm, yeah, Nature-san totes loves this 
"go with the flow" attitude that Ikuno has!
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
Ahaha, they seem to be having a lot of fun over there. Okay, 
let's come up with some ideas of our own!
data.name: Mejiro Palmer

data.text:
O-Okay! Although, I don't think I'll 
have as many ideas as my senpais…!
data.name: Kitasan Black

data.text:
We'll liven up the anniversary live concert 
in our own way, so don't worry about it!
data.name: Satono Diamond

data.text:
Yes, good! Such pure ambition!…Now then, let's talk about 
which one of these party sunglasses we'll be wearing!
data.name: Mejiro Palmer
